revised_title: Corrections to Equations and Figures in a Previous Publication
tldr: This article provides corrections to equations and figures in a previous publication. It corrects the direction of the horizontal disturbing force at St. Leonards and the angle made by the horizontal disturbing force at Campbelton with the geographical meridian. The article also corrects equations (96), (103), and (97) by adjusting the mathematical notation and removing a sign.
